info.name: Booksy API - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for Booksy booking system with Iranian cultural context.

Includes:
- User Management APIs
- Service Catalog APIs
- Booking Management
- Payment & Financial APIs
- Provider Management
- Authentication & Authorization

All sample data uses Persian names, Iranian phone numbers, national codes, and cultural context.

request.description: Authenticate user with email and password to get access token
Send OTP code to Iranian phone number for verification
Register new user with Persian name

body.raw:
{
  "firstName": "رضا",
  "lastName": "احمدی",
  "phoneNumber": "09123456789",
  "bio": "برنامه‌نویس و توسعه‌دهنده نرم‌افزار",
  "address": "تهران، خیابان ولیعصر، پلاک ۱۲۳",
  "profilePictureUrl": "https://example.com/avatars/reza.jpg"
}
